about_the_game:
This DLC is a free DONATION for supporting the developer.

NO DATA will be provided.

This DLC is only for donations. it contains no content and will not affect the game.

But we could add a special bonus in game later for anyone who make theses donations (like special color name in tchat of a custom Donation Icon for tchat)

Amount spent is only helping game to progress and to pay the vital need of the project (like private server hosting & registered paid content).

So if you love current game and / or want to help it further please free to acquire this DLC.
